title: TUESDAY 4/27 - 49ERS QB DECISION
itunes:title: TUESDAY 4/27 - 49ERS QB DECISION
description:
The 49ers holding the third pick in the draft and head coach Kyle Shanahan (0:05) talks about the decision to trade up so they can get a QB. The Patriots (1:14) looking to trade up with the hope of landing Justin Fields. Alabama running back Najee Harris (1:30) talks about why he deserves to be a first round pick. The Falcons (2:31) taking calls on trading Julio Jones. Packers GM Brian Gutekunst (2:51) discusses the future of Aaron Rodgers in Green Bay, and Cowboys linebacker Sean Lee (3:46) calls it a career

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
